content:
EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Iron Smelting Area (Position x=0.0-2.0, y=0.0)
Consists of two stone furnaces that process iron ore into iron plates
- Furnace 1 at position(0.0, 0.0)
- Furnace 2 at position(2.0, 0.0)

### Copper Smelting Area (Position x=4.0, y=4.0)
Single stone furnace processing copper ore into copper plates
- Furnace at position(4.0, 4.0)

### Electronic Circuit Production Line (Position x=6.5-12.5, y=11.5)
Assembly line for creating electronic circuits consisting of:
- Input wooden chest at position(6.5, 11.5)
- Burner inserter at position(7.5, 11.5)
- Assembling machine at position(9.5, 11.5)
- Output burner inserter at position(11.5, 11.5)
- Output wooden chest at position(12.5, 11.5)

### Power Generation System (Position x=-9.5 to -2.5, y=22.5-28.5)
Complete power generation setup with:
- Offshore pump at position(-9.5, 24.5)
- Pipe network connecting components
- Boiler at position(-7.0, 24.5)
- Steam engine at position(-2.5, 24.5)
- Electric pole network connecting power to other structures

ERROR TIPS

### Inventory shortage errors
- Check inventory before attempting to insert items into machines
- Common items running out: coal, iron ore
- Keep track of raw material levels and harvest more when running low

### Entity placement/access errors
- Could not get Lab at position(0.5, 28.5) - Ensure the entity exists before trying to access it
- Verify entity positions are correct when trying to interact with them

### Resource management
- Monitor coal levels in boiler to maintain consistent power generation
- Keep furnaces supplied with fuel and ore to maintain continuous production
- Track assembler ingredient levels to prevent production stoppages

### Entity status monitoring
- Pay attention to "NO_INGREDIENTS" warnings on furnaces
- Monitor "ITEM_INGREDIENT_SHORTAGE" status on assembling machines
- Keep track of power system status (boiler/steam engine) to maintain electricity
